_meta.description: Evidence citations for FreeComputeCloud provider catalog defaults
_meta.note: All URLs are public documentation. Numeric defaults are CONSERVATIVE estimates â€” operators MUST verify against their own account limits before production use.

citations.title: vLLM OpenAI-Compatible Server Documentation
citations.notes: vLLM serves an OpenAI-compatible HTTP API at /v1/chat/completions and /v1/models. Supports optional --api-key flag for server-side auth. No external rate limits (local).

citations.title: Gemini API Rate Limits
citations.notes: Free tier limits vary by model. gemini-2.0-flash: 15 RPM, 1M TPM, 1500 RPD. gemini-2.5-pro-preview: 5 RPM, 250K TPM, 25 RPD. Limits are per-project and may vary by region/eligibility. Catalog defaults use lower conservative values.

citations.title: Groq Rate Limits Documentation
citations.notes: Groq rate limits are org-level. Free tier for llama-3.3-70b-versatile: 30 RPM, 15K TPM, 14.4K RPD. Limits queryable from response headers (x-ratelimit-*). Catalog defaults use conservative values below published limits.

citations.title: Alibaba Cloud Model Studio Free Quota
citations.notes: Free token quota for new accounts varies by model (e.g., 1M free tokens for qwen-plus). International vs mainland editions have different endpoints and eligibility. Catalog uses intl endpoint (dashscope-intl.aliyuncs.com).

citations.title: OpenRouter Rate Limits and Free Models
citations.notes: Free model variants (suffixed :free) have reduced rate limits. Limits vary by model and change frequently. OpenRouter requires HTTP-Referer and X-Title headers. Catalog defaults are conservative.
